name: Exp10sion
description:
Every 10 seconds, a bomb explodes.
Each explosion marks the start of a new round.
In each round, traces of the previous bomb remain.
In every level, there are Exp10sions!!!

Exp10sion, a puzzle platformer:

You will play as a bomb that explodes within 10 seconds, managing to reach the Target Door before explosion.

Each explosion respawns the bomb, starts a new round, and generates a "Time Shadow" representing your trail of previous round.

Skillfully use your shadow and level's mechanisms to overcome numerous obstacles and unravel puzzles, in the cycle of explosions and rebirth!

Key Features:

🕒 Tick-Tock Tensions: In "Exp10sion", time takes center stage. As the clock steadily ticks away, your adorable bomb character faces an explosive fate. Can you unravel time's mysteries at a leisurely pace?

🌟 Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in the enchanting pixelated scenes of "Exp10sion". Explore meticulously crafted levels inspired by retro aesthetics, each offering a cozy atmosphere and a touch of nostalgia.

🧩 Whimsical Puzzles: "Exp10sion" challenges your intellect with a wide array of time-centric puzzles in over 70 levels. Magnets, lasers or even something that can stop the ticking timer.

Ludum Dare:

The prototype of this game is made during Ludum Dare 51, under the theme of "Every 10 seconds".
